title: Event Step Configuration
description: Event-driven step that subscribes to multiple email events and tracks engagement analytics across the email automation system.

title: Email Metrics Management
description: Creates and updates email metrics for individual emails, tracking status changes and event timestamps.

title: Campaign Analytics Update
description: Updates campaign-level analytics with aggregated metrics and calculates performance rates (delivery, open, click rates).

title: Engagement Milestone Detection
description: Checks for engagement milestones and triggers milestone events when performance thresholds are reached.

title: Analytics Event Emission
description: Emits analytics update events for dashboard updates and system monitoring with comprehensive metrics data.
